column4: I have this ntfs partition with some text files on it. for some reason, all of these are marked as executables, so that nautilus keeps asking if I want to display or execute. Even if I create a new "empty file" and call it text.txt if asks.
how can I get it not to mark all files as executable??
you must set umask (or dmask and fmask) in /etc/fstab
